(I don't know if it's impossible to post for this or not)


Beachcomber/Ramhorn:



Beachcomber saw the explosives fly.  "Slag!" he yelled, getting up, he ran as 
fast as he could, leaping into the air, he landed on the explosives.  Putting 
his torso over the explosives, bringing them closer to him, they went off, 
blowing him apart into a hundred different pieces, Beachcomber DYING. 

(Zardus, put Beachcomber as a deceased, killed by Marine)

Ramhorn stood up.  "NOOOOO!" he yelled, raising his sub-machine gun, firing 
off his shells in an arm, back and forth from one Predacon to the middle to 
the other one, then back.  25 sonic shells launched out at the three 
Predacons, Ramhorn screaming angrily.
